resources.string: Neprivalomas pilnas transliacijos aprašymas. Galima naudoti %1$s. Ilgis negali viršyti %2$s simbolių.
URL, į kurį „Lichess“ kreipsis gauti PGN atnaujinimus. Privalo būti viešai pasiekiamas internete.
Taip pat galite įvesti iki 64 Lichess žaidimų id, atskyrę juos tarpais.
Neprivaloma; tik jeigu žinote, kada prasideda renginys

string.name: definitivelyDeleteRound
string.comment:
definitivelyDeleteRound
Refers to live tournaments being broadcast on lichess
Description (also translateable): Delete all games of this round. The source will need to be active in order to re-create them.

resources.string: Užtikrintai ištrinti raundą ir jo partijas.

string.name: deleteAllGamesOfThisRound
string.comment:
deleteAllGamesOfThisRound
This is a button when editing a broadcast round. "Source" refers to the broadcasting source, usually an URL pointing to a PGN file which is continuously updated by the tournament organizers and polled by Lichess to get new moves. The button is used when a mismatch occurs between the broadcast state and the source, e.g. when a move is reverted in the source. Deleting all games causes the state to be recreated completely from the source the next time it is polled by Lichess.

resources.string: Ištrinti visas partijas šiame raunde. Norint jas perkurti reikės aktyvaus šaltinio.
